Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory90.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: 'Gather up and defend! Keep an eye on your companions!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Zone 2, switch places with Zone 4! Move!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: 'Shields up!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'On the snowy field, the bionics exchange blows with the ARU. The ravage beasts charge incessantly in an attempt to rip apart the joint army of Babylonia and the ARU.'}
{3: "However, the ARU remains unbroken. On the contrary, their forces became more united under Simon's command."}
{3: "Everyone is fighting as one. Even though Simon's tactical decisions are old-fashioned in Babylonia terms, they proved highly effective against the scattered bionics."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: 'Good, good! Looks like our side will be victorious if we keep this up.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "I wouldn't be so optimistic...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'Huh? Why?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "The drawn out battle will exhaust the meat-and-bones ARU members, and the Constructs from Babylonia can't keep up for long due to M.I.N.D. exhaustion from combat.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'If only I were as good at M.I.N.D. calibration like Boss...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Simon's pace of speech and breath quickens hastily as he speaks."}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'What... What do you mean by this?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'In short, our fate is the hands of Boss. And—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Sorry, Captain. My stomach is disagreeing with me... Ngh!!!'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'Oi, what the hell? Why are you vomiting all of a sudden. Dammit!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Comm Message', 3: 'Commandant Simon, your orders! Commandant Simon!'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'This... Damn it. Damn IT!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: "I'll take the helm! All hands, get ready to fight like you've never!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory224.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Amberia (Atiel)', 3: 'Cough... Ugh! Ahhhhh!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The tremors grow within the chamber as the energy transfer continues.'}
{3: "Rosetta falls and kneels uncontrollably with Atiel's anguished scream. Her light wings deactivate, and her weapons slink out of her hand, landing on the floor with a series of metallic clinks."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Amberia (Atiel)', 3: 'AAAHHHHHH!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Amberia's lower body, already charged, launches a chaotic flurry of attacks. She shoots at random, but is unusually effective at suppressing you and Rosetta."}
{2: 'Rosetta, is your M.I.N.D. okay?', 3: '32', 4: '(Stand in front of Rosetta)', 5: '33'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'N-no... Amberia has forcefully linked with my M.I.N.D... The pain... Rgh!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Rosetta is unable to continue fighting in this state, so you pilot your mech in front of Rosetta to protect her from Atiel's attacks."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Thank you... Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineBaozhaNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Amberia (Atiel)', 3: 'AAAAGGHHH!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The energy pipeline seems to be practically writhing, speeding up energy transfer. Rosetta finally stands, lifting herself up with the back of your mech.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineBaozhaNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Commandant, this doesn't look good. Remember on the files...? Our roots also trace back to Amberia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I feel weak all over... Can you try to remote link and dive into my M.I.N.D.?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Do you need help calibrating your M.I.N.D.?', 3: '39', 4: "But if so, we'll both be left open.", 5: '40'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'No, something more crucial than that...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "As I've said, I will keep you safe.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Rosetta unfolds her light wings once more. She grips the handle of her spear with her two still functional fingers.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Commandant, since Amberia is now linked with my M.I.N.D., you can use it as a proxy to hop into hers—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Then you can use this... The "code" I just managed to steal.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Rosetta shows you Evan's voice recorder. She somehow retrieved it in the mayhem just now."}
{2: "We'll put Amberia back to sleep?", 3: '45'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Yeah... That might sever her link to the bionics... And end the war outside.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Commandant... Ngh!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Amberia launches a sudden barrage at you. Rosetta arduously blocks it with her shield.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'More importantly... If her M.I.N.D. is weakened, I can stand a chance against her.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Amberia's energy pellets land on Rosetta's shield and dissipates into an icy sheet of fog. Rosetta turns her head at you in pain."}
{3: 'By the look in her eyes—you could see that she is determined to win.'}
{2: 'Win, Rosetta.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Please hurry... I don't know how much longer my M.I.N.D. can take it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Connection initiated.'}
